Howick RSA may lose clubrooms after multi-million-dollar sale to Malaysian developer https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/howick-rsa-may-lose-clubrooms-after-multimillion-dollar-sale-to-malaysian-developer/FLGE3GBXZREY7KHV7IKGMALUUM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/howick-rsa-may-lose-clubrooms-after-multimillion-dollar-sale-to-malaysian-developer/FLGE3GBXZREY7KHV7IKGMALUUM/ Tom DillaneThe $4-6m sale is the second RSA in weeks that has been bought for redevelopment. Sun, 22 Oct 2023 16:00:00 +0000 The Howick RSA has been sold to Malysian developers for between $4-6 million for a planned apartment complex that was to include new clubrooms, which has now been scrapped. The Howick RSA will now just get cash and lose the land. Photo / Alex Burton
